item.description:
This year we will combine two of our favorite events.........food and dropping off donations to the Hull Seaside Animal Rescue Animal Shelter.

We will start the day riding to Karen's house for brunch.....she always has some yummy eats!

We will leave and ride with our eventual destination at the Hull animal shelter to drop off donations to the shelter and visit with the cats. This shelter has cats only......Maybe someone wants to adopt one????

From there we will do the coastal route up Jerusalem Road in Cohasset and eventually end up at June's house for dessert.

Please check the following link for the wish list for the shelter and donate as generously as you can:

Click here: Donations to Hull Seaside Animal Rescue or
http://www.hsar.org/d...

Meeting Location: Panera Bread
Time: 8:45 AM Ride leaves at 915 am
Cost: $8 to cover brunch and dessert

We will arrive at Karen's house for brunch around 1030 am so don't stuff yourselves at Panera!!!!!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Pause For Paws/Rolling Brunch
